short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to take screenshots and paste them into a basecamp conversation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended for PC users who want to include a screenshot in Basecamp comments without the hassle of having to save it as an image and then attaching the image. This extension will not work with Apple products.
